website_summaries.verdict: The general response for the Mizuno Wave Prophecy 6 was positive. Most of those who have tested it have welcomed its appealing looks, its comfortable underfoot platform, and its secure upper coverage. According to them, it’s a solid option for road running. But for some, it was narrow in the forefoot area.
pros: The color schemes that are available for the Mizuno Wave Prophecy 6 received some praise from many runners
A reviewer commented that the heel section of the upper unit hugged the foot snugly, but it didn’t feel too tight
A lot of testers were able to describe this shoe as ‘comfortable’ for their feet
According to a purchaser, the toe box was roomy enough to allow natural toe-splay
The raised mid-foot platform was able to support those with flat feet, and they stated that it prevented fatigue during those extended running sessions
A consumer commented on the padding in the upper unit, noting that it provided some cushioning as it hugged the foot
The mid-sole in this shoe gained the favor of several runners because, for them, it was responsive and reliable
Many purchasers noted that the 6th version of the Prophecy was better in quality and construction than its predecessors
The general width and length of the shoe seemed a bit narrow for a few testers
According to a reviewer, the mid-sole unit tore apart after only 3 weeks of use
cons: The toe box seemed to be narrow, according to a consumer
she felt numbness in the toes because of it

customer_reviews.title: but they were discontinued and increasing the numbers has not made the shoe better but worse
customer_reviews.text: i was a huge fan of the prophecy 4,but they were discontinued and increasing the numbers has not made the shoe better but worse. too bad,i never can understand why shoe company's do this..
customer_reviews.author: Ann Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm a die hard Mizuno fan. These are absolutely awesome feeling. I love them. Totally recommended!!! Unlike others who have reviewed it I do not think you need to buy bigger. I also think the cushioning is fantastic. I always wear I 9.5 and that's what I bought. They fit perfect. I think unlike others that they have gotten better. I usually wear wave creations but this is my second wave prophecy. I had the 4s and now the 6s are better. I have to say my 4s deteriorated fast. Way faster than my wave creations ever have. I was not too sure about buying these. But I can tell they are constructed way better than my 4s were.
customer_reviews.author: Greg_amazon_fan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and completely capable running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Size 14D/M - Great shoe, although, a bit on the pricey side so I have to knock off a star. I liked the Wave Prophecy 2 better. The WP 6 seems a bit shorter and therefore loose around the padded collar/ankle. They are holding up as well as my WP 2's that took 3 years of abuse and 1,000 of miles with my 250-270 lbs frame. I run an average of 10 miles a week about 40-50 weeks out of the year. So, longest I have ever owned a shoe was with Mizuno.
customer_reviews.author: MJCHUPKA

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but they are smaller than US Standard sizing
customer_reviews.text: Overall I do like these. I'm impressed with cushioning on the heels. They are small ... I recommend 1/2 or full size bigger than your daily shoes. This is my 2nd week and 5th run on the treadmill so they may stretch, but I doubt it. I would recommend these, in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Knox

customer_reviews.title: I love Wave Prophecy shoes and own several pairs of older ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 11-1/2 but I normally wear an 11. This shoe is too tight in width and length. My advice if you purchase this shoe is get it one size larger and if you have a wide foot not to buy it at all. I love Wave Prophecy shoes and own several pairs of older models but each new model year they seem to get smaller and narrower. I have bought my last pair because of this. Wake up Mizuno you are killing a great shoe and running your reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D. Brezeale

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shoe. It is so comfortable and light weight. It fits accurately. Not too small, not too big, just right. I would suggest this shoe not only for runners but also as an everyday shoe. Ive always had back pain every since I had back surgery 2 years ago. Ive found out from experience, if my shoe isn't comfortable then ,my back will hurt. This shoe has helped so much. It is worth the price and will buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a present for my boyfriend they are true to size and "the most comfortable shoes [he's] ever owned." The colors are awesome and very vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh White

customer_reviews.title: Wave prophecy 6
customer_reviews.text: Mizuno makes the best shoes in the business. I came from a pair of wave prophecy 4's, these were a little snug at fist but after about 5 miles they were perfect. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great support for my broken ankle, and finally, a sneaker with a true size fit.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene S.

customer_reviews.title: light weight and feels good
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and great quality. I will definitely be buying more pairs like this from Mizuno in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I have a Wave Prophecy 4 that I'm really disappointed because the holes and I`m not a athletic woman
customer_reviews.text: I hope that this new pair of my Wave shoes does not stick to the toes and the instep because it is a very expensive product. But the wave front and back is sensational. This is the reason for my purchase. I have a Wave Prophecy 4 that I'm really disappointed because the holes and I`m not a athletic woman.
customer_reviews.author: Nora RVM Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Much better!
customer_reviews.text: Way to narrow. I bought the wave runner 20. Much better!
customer_reviews.author: 5TimesZero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes this is my second pair, it last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Messner

customer_reviews.title: They broke
customer_reviews.text: They broke in the heel in 15 days had to ask for a refund
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and the wave of comfort makes for a great run, love these!!! I always run 3.5 miles and these are definitely a step up from my last Mizunos.
customer_reviews.author: Ronstheman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers broke after 3 weeks of easy use. Cost $250 to ship back. Find a local vendor or you will own an expensive Chunk of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: antonio roque

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for value
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery. Shoes are comfortable and durable. Value priced for quality delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes ever. This is my second pair. I get them the same size as my shoe size. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christinap

customer_reviews.title: Love my Mizuno running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love my new prophecy 6! They are the most comfortable running shoes I've ever worn while running in marathons.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Guglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Is a little shorter, a little narrower, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a little shorter, a little narrower, and a little shallower in the heel cup, 15 fits me well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes!! First pair I have tried won't be my last.
customer_reviews.author: George Alex hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Not a great running show
customer_reviews.text: Not a great running show. Not what I expected at all. Thought it would improve my run and provide less stress on my legs but, the opposite.
customer_reviews.author: ChicChic

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. Looks great. Fits great. The best thing is the sole, it's very durable and strong. My 2nd shoe from muzino.
customer_reviews.author: Rhishikesh Thakare

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Prophecy 6 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The luxury of running! the ultimate in cushioning continues to evolve with an improved step in feel and a softer, lighter upper for runners seeking luxury and an unparalleled ride. The Wave prophecy 6 nova add it on features added Rainbow reflectivity that makes this shoe really shine.
